algorithm_technique: Digit DP / Combinatorics: Count numbers with distinct digits up to n.
problem_summary_simple: Count positive integers up to n where all digits are distinct.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates special numbers by considering digit counts and then uses a digit-by-digit approach with a lookup set for distinctness.
key_insights: Break down the problem into counting numbers with fewer digits than n, and then numbers with the same number of digits as n.
For numbers with fewer digits, use permutations (P(m, k)).
For numbers with the same number of digits, iterate digit by digit, ensuring distinctness and staying within the bound of n.
